title: Is Solo/Duo coming Out today for NA?
body:
I want to play ranked but, I don't want to risk any bugs or anything again. Can we get an answer for ranked solo/duo resetting today?

I've been seeing rumors on Reddit that placements where going on but, where rolled back? I just woke up and can't verify anything...

replies.body:
I don't know of any official announcements about this yet. Keep an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) where one will be made if anything changes.

Let me know if you have any *other* questions.

I had a game tell me that I had won the first game of my placements and for about an hour after that it showed me as being in provisionals for all three queues. It's since gone back to the way it was before. Not sure if I earned any LP from that game.
